fields.doc: Timestamp when the Kafka message was created.
fields.name: kafka_timestamp

fields.doc: Time when SAL created the message.
fields.name: sal_created

fields.doc: Time when SAL ingested the message.
fields.name: sal_ingested

fields.doc: Time to azimuth limit for current target (in minutes)
fields.name: timeToAzlim

fields.doc: Time to rotator limit for current target (in minutes)
fields.name: timeToRotlim

fields.doc: Time to current target rising/becoming observable (in minutes)
fields.name: timeToObservable

fields.doc: Time for current target to set/become unobservable (in minutes)
fields.name: timeToUnobservable

fields.doc: Time until current target enters zenith blind-spot (in minutes)
fields.name: timeToBlindSpot

fields.doc: Time until current target leaves zenith blind-spot (in minutes)
fields.name: timeToBlindSpotExit
